name: ScareMaze
description:
Using possession, try to avoid the flashlights and scare the people hunting you through the maze on Linguini the Penguini's farm. 

You'll get hurt when a flashlight hits you in your ghost form, and if you get hit too much you'll die.

Possess the various pumpkins and scarecrows throughout the maze to avoid the flashlights and scare the people as they pass by.
Controls:

mouse: turn
W: move forward
Q: Possess an object you are facing
Spacebar: Jump out of an object to scare a nearby person
